title: Hong Kong Marine Department - Lighthouse Information
description: Official government information about Hong Kong's lighthouse network, including technical specifications and operational status.

title: Antiquities and Monuments Office - Cape D'Aguilar Lighthouse
description: Official heritage designation documentation for Cape D'Aguilar Lighthouse as a declared monument.

description: Comprehensive historical account of Hong Kong's lighthouse development from 1875 to present day.

description: Academic paper examining the architectural significance of Hong Kong's colonial-era maritime infrastructure including lighthouses.

title: Beacons of the Pearl River: Hong Kong's Lighthouse Heritage
description: Documentary film exploring the history and significance of Hong Kong's lighthouse network.

title: Evolution of Maritime Safety Systems in Hong Kong Waters
description: Research paper tracing the development of maritime safety infrastructure in Hong Kong from the 19th century to modern times.
author: Dr. Maritime Studies
